Title: Corona yazonze abagabo batamenyereye mu rugo, agacupa gasimburwa n’igikoma-Senderi
Body:
Umuhanzi Senderi International Hit yasohoye indirimbo asaba abafana be n’Abanyarwanda muri rusange kumvira inama zibasaba kuguma mu rugo. Avuga ko corona yabaye ikibazo cyane cyane ku bagabo batamenyereye kuguma igihe kirekire mu rugo. Ni mu ndirimbo yise ‘Corona Gezaho’.
Avuga ko iki cyorezo cyahagaritse ubuzima bwa benshi ariko cyane cyane ba nyakabyizi n’abashomeri batari basanzwe bafite icyo binjiza. Avuga k obo ubuzima bwababanye ibamba.
Ati: “ Corona waturaje rwantambi. Uhagarika abari bafite ubukwe, ukura abana mu mashuri, uhombya ibihugu karahava…”
Senderi avuga ko iyo coronavirus yabujije abagabo kwisanzura cyane kuko ngo yabagize imfungwa, ntibashobora kujya gusangira icupa na bagenzi babo, bamwe mu banywaga agahiye bayoboka igikoma.
Mu ndirimbo ye kandi avuga ko coronavirus yaryamishije abasore matelas zirika n’abakobwa babura amafaranga yo kugura mega zo kujya ku mbuga nkoranyambaga(chat).
Nubwo avuga ibibazo abantu bahuriye nabyo mu ngo zabo kubera kiriya cyorezo, Senderi avuga ko kuguma mu rugo ari ingenzi.
Yanenze abantu buririye kuri iki cyorezo bagakwirakwiza impuha.

Title: Kigali: Umuhanzi Naason yapfushije  Se
Body:
Umuhanzi  Nshimiyimana  Naason uzwi ku izina rya Naason yapfushije Se witwa Djumaine Athanase wari umaze igihe arwaye. Mushiki wa Naason kwa Sewabo witwa Sabrina Uyisenga yabwiye Umuseke ko Sewabo yari amaze igihe kirekire arwaye ariko kwa muganga bari baramubuzemo indwara.
Nyakwigendera yari asanzwe atuye mu Murenge wa Kimisagara, ahitwa Kamuhoza mu karere ka Nyarugenge.
Uyisenga Sabrina avuga ko nyakwigendera yigeze kuba umwe mu bacuranzi ba chorale Hoziana ya ADEPR Nyarugenge.
Atabarutse afite imyaka 67 y’amavuko akaba asize abana umunani Naason we akaba ari uwa kabiri.
Jean Pierre NIZEYIMANA UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abarimo Sandrine Isheja, Bruce Melodie, Arthur baratanga inama zo kwirinda COVID-19
Body:
Ibyamamare bitandukanye mu Rwanda birimo abahanzi, abanyamakuru n’abanyarwenya bahagurukiye ubukangurambaga bugamije kurwanya icyorezo cya Coronavirus (COVID-19) batanga inama uburyo abantu bakwiye kwitwara muri ibi bihe burimo no kuguma mu rugo.
Ubu butumwa bari kubutambusta ku mbuga nkoranyambaga zabo nka Instagram, bagahamagarira abaturarwanda kwirinda iki cyorezo kimaze gufata abagera kuri 40 mu Rwanda.
Mu butumwa bw’amashusho, Bruce Melodie yabwiye buri muturarwanda waba warabanye n’umuntu ufite ibimenyetso by’iki cyorezo cyangwa we ubwe akaba abifite, akwiye kwihutira kubimenyesha inzego z’ubuzima.
Uyu muhanzi kandi asaba abaturarwanda gukomeza kwitwararika “Mugume mu rugo, mukarabe intoki, amagara araseseka ntayorwe.”
Umunyamakuru Sandrine Isheja Butera asaba abaturarwanda kwirinda ingendo zitari ngombwa bakaguma mu rugo kugira ngo batagira aho bahurira n’ubwandi bw’iki cyorezo.
Uyu munyamakuru usanzwe ari n’umubyeyi wubatse by’umwihariko ubutumwa bwe yibanze ku babyeyi abasaba kugumana n’abana mu rugo bakabarinda gutarabuka.
Ati “Mubafashe gusubiramo amasomo ni n’igihe kiza cyo kuganira n’abana ukaganira n’umwana ugakina n’umwana wawe mukaganira mukaba inshuti.”
Umuhanzi Mani Martin we yacyebuye abanyarwanda bakomeje gukerensa inama n’ingamba bari kugirwa na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ku buryo hari abumva ko areba bamwe abandi bakaba bayakomoreweho.
Ati “Nyabuneka nyabuneka guma mu rugo, nubwo amabwiriza tuyahabwa ariko birababaje kubona hari abayarengaho wasohoka mu rugo ugiye kugura icyo kurya ukabona abantu baragenda”
Uyu muhanzi uvuga ko nta kintu kidasanzwe na kimwe cyabuza Ubuntu kubahiriza ariya mabwiriza, yibutsa abantu ko kiriya cyorezo gifata buri wese bityo ko no kukirinda bireba buri wese, akibutsa abantu gusukura ibiganza n’amazi meza ndetse n’isabune.
Umunyarwenya Nkusi Arthur, na we yatanze ubutumwa bwuzuye urwenya ariko butanga inama zo kudacika intege.
Atangira agira ati “Ibintu byakomeye ariko ntimugire ubwoba [agakubita agatwenge]…”
Uyu munyarwenya we agira inama abaturarwanda kudaha agaciro ibihuha no kwirinda kuyobywa na byo ahubwo bakajya bizera amakuru yatanzwe na Minisiteri y’Ubuzima nk’urwego rufite ububasha bwo gutanga amakuru areba iki cyorezo.
Asaba abantu kudakomeza kumva ko ibintu byadogereye kandi bakibanda ku makuru areba igihugu cyabo aho gukurikirana ayo mu bindi bihugu.

Title: Manu Dibango wari umuhanzi ukomeye ku Isi yahitanywe na Covid-19
Body:
Umuhanzi Manu Dibango wahimbwe “Papy Groove” yatabarutse afite imyaka 86. Yapfuye kuri uyu wa kabiri tariki 24 azize Covid-19, indwara ituruka kuri coronavirus.
Urupfu rwe rwatangajwe n’abo mu muryango we, bavuze ko yishwe na Covid-19.
Itangazo ry’umuryango we rigira riti “Babyeyi dukunda, nshuti, ijwi rirahamagarira kure… N’umubabaro turabatangariza urupfu rwa Manu Dibango, ‘Papy Groove’ wacu, yapfuye tariki 24 Werurwe 2020 afite imyaka 86, azize Covid-19.”
Manu Dibango ubusanzwe akomoka muri Cameroon yageze i Marseille mu 1949 akiri ingimbi, ibikorwa bye byamuhesheje umudari w’icyubahiro Chevalier de la Légion d’honneur mu 2010.
Uyu mugabo yari agikomeye acuranga injyana ya jazz n’iyitwa musique classique, ndetse mu mwaka ushize yakoze ibitaramo bitandukanye.
Abamuzi bavuga ko yari umugabo w’igihangange, munini kandi ubwo bunini bwe bungana n’ubumuntu yagiraga, ngo yahoraga yishimye.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Olivier Nduhungirehe yavuze ko Cemeroon, Africa n’Isi bibuze umuntu ukomeye, ukwiye icyubahiro.

Title: Kenny Rogers yapfuye
Body:
Umuhanzi wo ku rwego rw’isi wamenyekanye mu njyana zigenda gahoro ariko zifasha abantu kuruhuka witwa Kenny Rogers yapfuye afite imyaka 81. Ni umuhanzi wari umuhanga cyane k’uburyo yahawe ibihembo bya Grammy Award inshuro eshatu.
Rogers yabaye icyamamare cyane mu gihe cy’imyaka 20 ni ukuvuga guhera 1970 kugeza 1980.
Abo mu muryango we bavuga ko yazize urupfu rusanzwe. Ngo si COVID -19.
Yaguye iwe ari kumwe n’abo mu muryango n’inshuti ze.
Kenneth Ray Rogers yavutse taliki 21, Kanama, 1938.Yakoraga indi  mirimo irimo ubucuruzi, gukina filimi, akandika kandi akanaririmba indirimbo.
Yari umwe mu bagize itsinda ry’ibirangirire muri muzika ryitwa Country Music Hall of Fame.
Yari azi kuririmba ariko akanacuraga guitar ya bass.
Indirimbo ze zatangiye kumenyekana cyane muri 1967 gukomeza kugeza mu myaka ya 1990.
Guhera muri 1975 yakoze muzika wenyine ariko akajya akorana rimwe na rimwe n’abandi bahanzi muri country bakomeye nka Dolly Parton na Sheena Easton ndetse na Lionel Richie.
Imwe mu ndirimbo yakoze zigakundwa kurusha izindi zose ni iyo yise ‘The Gambler’. Iyi yayikoze muri 1978.
Mu buzima bwe bwose yakoze indirimbo zirenga 120 akaba yaragurishije albums miliyoni 100 ku isi hose.
Ibi byatumye aba umwe mu bahanzi bake bagurishije album nyinshi kurusha abandi babayeho.

Title: Congo-Brazza: Umuhanzi Aurlus Mabélé yishwe na COVID-19
Body:
Umuhanzi ukomoka muri Repubulika ya Congo- Brazzaville  Aurlus Mabélé wabaga mu Bufaransa yishwe na COVID-19. Yari afite imyaka 67 y’amavuko. Ni umwe mu bahanzi b’Africa bamenyekanye cyane mu myaka ya 1980 na 1990. Yabaga mu Bufaransa.
Abo mu muryango we n’abakunzi be batangaje ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ko yishwe na coronavirus.
Abafana be bamwitaga umwami w’injyana ya Soukous, iyi ikaba ari injyana yo muri Repubulika iharanira Demukarasi ya Kongo ikundwa henshi muri Africa.
Umukobwa we yitwa witwa Liza Monet nawe usanzwe ari umuhanzi mu Bufaransa yavuze ko yababajwe n’urupfo rwa Se wahitanywe na coronavirus.
Ati: “ Ubu mfite agahinda kenshi k’uburyo ntawampoza.”
Inshuti ye kandi isanzwe ikorera mu itsinda yashinze ryitwa Loketo yitwa Mav Cacharel nawe yanditse kuri Facebook ko Mabélé yishwe na coronavirus.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko usanzwe akurikirana ibikorwa bya Mabélé witwa Jimmy Ouetebou yabwiye BBC ko atakwemeza ko Mabélé yazize coronavirus kuko n’ubundi ngo yari asanganywe ibibazo by’ubuzima harimo uburwayi bw’igihe kirekire.
Mabélé, amazina ye nyayo ni Aurélien Miatsonama, akomoka muri Congo-Brazzaville ariko muri 1980 yimukiye mu Bufaransa.
Ni umwe mu bahanzi bakomeye ba Africa yo mu nsi y’ubutayu bwa Sahara akaba ari umwe mu batangije kandi bamenyekanisha ku isi injyana ya soukous.
Imwe mu ndirimbo ze zakunzwe kurusha izindi ni iyo yise Embargo.

Title: Ikiganiro na Oda Paccy wifuza gufasha abandi bakobwa bafite impano yo kuririmba
Body:
Uzamberumwana Oda Pacifique uzwi  Oda Paccy ni umuhanzi kazi nyarwanda ubifatanya no gushabika mu muziki muri Label ya Ladies Empire anabereye umuyobozi. Aganira n’umuseke yavuze ko  umuziki wamugejeje kuri byinshi bityo akaba yifuza kuzamura n’abandi bakobwa bafite impano yo kuririmba.
Uzamberumwana Oda Paccy imfura mu muryango w’abana babiri akaba umubyeyi w’umwana umwe, yinjiye mu muziki byeruye muri 2009 ahita ashyira hanze indirimbo yise Ese Nzapfa yanamufashije kumenyekana
Ati “Usibye iriya ndirimbo navuga ko n’indi nise ‘miss president’ ari yo yamfashije kwisobanukirwa  ndetse nzahora nyubaha cyane, yatumye nibuka ko ndi umugore ushobora kurwanirira igihugu bibaye ngombwa.”
Oda Paccy yemeza ko yakoze injyana ya Hip Hop kuko ari injyana idakorwa cyane n’igitsinagore.
Ati “Burya Hip Hop si injyana nakoze mbere y’izindi zose kuko na  mbere y’uko menyekana mu muziki nabanje kujya nandika indirimbo ziri mu mujyo wa RnB ariko navuga ko nakoze Hip Hop kuko yari injyana idakorwa cyane n’igitsina gore mu Rwanda.”
Akomeza avuga ko umuziki wagize uruhare rukomeye mu iterambere ry’umwari n’umutegarugori mu Rwanda.
Ati “Umuziki navuga ko ari uruvugiro ndetse ni ahantu haca ubutumwa bwibutsa abagore gukomera kandi ko bashoboye ndetse ko nta kintu na kimwe kidashoboka kuri bo. Umuziki kandi wibutsa ko abagore ari abantu bagaciro.”
Oda Paccy avuga ko ibyo amaze kugeraho mu muziki byamuhaye igitekerezo cyo  gufasha abakobwa bagenzi be abicishije muri Label ya Ladies Empire abereye umuyobozi.
Ngo ubu bufasha azabutanga abinyujije muri Label ye Ladies Empire yateguye amarushanwa yo gushaka abakobwa bafite impano mu muziki.
Avuga ko umukobwa ushaka kwinjira muri aya marushanwa azifata amashusho atarengeje umunota arimo kuririmba akayohereza kuri whatsapp y’iriya Label n’imyirondoro ye ubundi bagasuzuma niba afite impano ikwiye gushyigikirwa.
Aya marushanwa yatangiye ku wa wa 18 Werurwe kugeza ku wa 5 Mata 2020.
Avuga ko iyo ataza gukora umuziki yari gukora ibifite aho bihuriye n’ikoranabuhanga cyane mu gice cya ‘Programming’.
Robert KAYIHURA

Title: Miss Naomie wanenzwe mu cya Leta ibikorwa bye ntazafatanya n’abategura Miss Rda
Body:
Miss Rwanda 2020 Naomie Nishimwe yatangaje ko ibikorwa bye birimo n’umushinga we azabikora adafatanyije n’abasanzwe bategura igikorwa cya Miss Rwanda banasanzwe bafatanya n’abakobwa batowe gushyira mu bikorwa imishinga bahize.
Mu itangazo ryashyizwe hanze n’uyu mukobwa uherutse gutorerwa kuba mwiza ku mubiri, mu muco n’ubumenyi, yatangaje ko ibijyanye n’inshingano ze mu gihe afite ikamba atazafatanya n’abategura irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda.
Iri tangazo ryashyizweho umukono na Naomie Nishimwe, rivuga ko iki cyemezo cyafashwe mu rwego rwo kumufasha gushyira imbaraga mu gushyira mu bikorwa umushinga we wo kubungabunga ubuzima bwo mu mutwe.
Rivuga kandi ko Miss Naomie azakomeza gukorana bya hafi na Rwanda Inspirational Backup bategura Miss Rwanda.
Naomie Nishimwe watorewe kuba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu  ijoro ryo ku wa 22 Gashyantare, yavugishije benshi ubwo yari agikandagira muri iri rushanwa ubwo ryari rikiri mu majonjora y’abazahagararira Intara enye n’Umujyi wa Kigali.
Uyu mukobwa waserukiye Umujyi wa Kigali, benshi bakoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga bakibona amafoto ye bayakwirakwije nk’abamamaza isuka ya cyapa ngona mu gihe cy’ihinga, bavuga ko ari we ukwiye ikamba rya Miss Rwanda 2020.
Uyu mukobwa ukirangiza amashuri yisumbuye kandi yanavugishije benshi ubwo hasohokaga amanota y’abarangije ayisumbuye mu mwaka w’amashuri wa 2019 batangarira amanota ye kuko amasomo ye menshi yagiye abona ikiciro cya nyuma.
Miss Naomie utararipfanye, yemeye ko ariya manota ari aye koko ariko ko abantu bakwiye kuyakira kandi bakamwakira nka Nyampinga kuko yamaze guhabwa iri kamba azamarana umwaka.

Title: Gahima ufite igihangano ‘ingorane’ ngo iya mbere ni ukugira umugore umwe ntimwumvikane
Body:
Umusaza Gahima Deogratias wo mu Kagari ka Ngoma mu Murenge wa Kabaya mu Karere ka Ngororero afite igihango kigaruka ku ngorane abantu banyuramo, avuga ko ingorane ya mbere ari ukugira umugore umwe ntimwumvikane.
Ni umusaza uzi kuganira cyane, akanyuzamo akanagamo amashyengo ariko yuje impanuro.
Yahimye igihangano ‘ingorane’ ngo ashaka kugaragaza amagorwa abantu banyuramo, akavuga ko yagira ngo atange ubutumwa bityo n’uwo atunze urutoki muri ibyo bihangano bye yikebuke.
Muri iki gihangano ke kiri mu kiciro gisa nk’ubusizi hari aho avuga ko umuntu ahirimbanira kubaho hakaba n’abo bivuna bakiyuha akuya ariko umusaruro babonye ntube ungana n’imbaraga batakaje.
Ati «Nahimbye izi ngorane kugira ngo mbibwire abantu bumve ibyo mvuga babihe agaciro.»
Ku isonga avuga ko ingorane ya mbere ari ukuba warashatse umugore umwe ariko ntimwumvikane, urugo rwanyu rugahoramo intonganya, bikaba byanagira ingaruka mbi ku burere bw’abana ndetse bikazanabakurikirana mu gihe bazaba bubatse ingo zabo.
Gahima ubu ufite imyaka 84 avuga ko umugore we wa mbere yitabye Imana agashaka undi ubu bakaba bamaranye imyaka irenga 25 bakaba babanye neza.
Agira ati « Nabuze umugore wange wa mbere, nishumbusha Bayavuge turi kumwe kugeza ubu. Bayavuge wange yandwanyeho muri iyo myaka yose. »
Bayavuge Francine na we ahamya ibivugwa n’umugabo we ko kuva bashakana babanye neza.
Ati “Uyu musaza twabanye neza ntakibazo gihari, twashakanye neza kandi kugeza ubu tubanye neza.”

Dieudonne NSHIMIYIMANA

Title: Tukowote avuga ko kuba akuze bitamushyiraho igitutu cyo gushaka
Body:
(VIDEO) Irunga Ronge umukinnyi wa Film uzwi nka Tukowote avuga ko imyaka itamushyira ku gitutu cyo gushaka umugore kuko ngo nk’umugabo umubiri we uzakomeza gukora neza nk’uko bisanzwe n’ubwo yaba akuze.
Tukowote avuga ko kuba yaratinze gushaka bitaba intandaro y’igitutu kinshi ngo ashake umugore huti huti.
Avuga ko akeneye igihe gihagije kugira ngo arobanure uwo umutima we uzashima.
Yemeza ko atashaka umugore kubera ko abandi bashatse, akongera ho ko kwigana abandi mu bintu bizakugiraho ingaruka igihe kirekire atari byiza.
Ati: “Mu buzima ikure ku gitutu cy’abantu wowe korera ku gitutu cyawe kuko uwo ugushyira  ku gitutu ngo kora ibi kora ibi ntuzi ikiri mu mutima we wenda ari kugushora.”
Tukowote kugeza ubu afite umukunzi ariko akemeza ko  nta gitutu ariho kandi adakeneye ukimushyiraho ahubwo ko inkono ihira igihe .
Ntiyemeranya n’abavuga ko imyaka  ari igipimo cyo gushakiraho n’ubwo bwose gutinda ugakabya atari byiza.
Tukowote yavukiye mu ri Repuburika iharanira Demukarasi ya Congo ariko  ababyeyi be ni Abanyarwanda.
Yatangiye gukina film mu mwaka wa 2006 ubu akaba  amaze gukina izigera mu 102 harimo film mpuzamahanga imwe ari na yo ya tangiriyeho yinjira muri uyu mwuga wa cinema.
Muri iki gihe ari gukina muri filim ngufi z’uruhererekane zitwa Bamenya.
Iyi filimi iherutse kwegukana igihembo cya Rwanda International Movie Award mu cyiciro cya internet web  yari ihanganyemo na Papa Sava.

Nicolas YUSUF

Title: Mama Nick na Papa Sava batwaye igihembo cy’abakinnyi  ba Film bakunzwe
Body:
Ku wa gatandatu muri Camp Kigali habereye igikorwa cyo gutanga ibihembo  muri filim zo mu Karere k’Ibiyaga Bigari kibaye ku nshuro ya mbere kiswe Rwanda International Movie Award, Papa Sava na Mama Nick muri filimi yitwa City Maid batwaye igihembo cy’abakinnyi bakunzwe.
Niyitegeka Gracien uzwi nka Papa Sava yahatanye n’abagera ku munani  mu cyiciro cy’abagabo kiswe BEST PEOPLE CHOICE, arabatsinda,  mu gihe Mukakamanzi Beatha bita Mama Nick we yahatanye mu kiciro cy’abagore.
Papa Sava yemeza ko gutsindira igihembo bitavuze ko abandi batitwaye neza ahubwo ko byavuye mu buryo yigaragarije abantu ubwo bazengurukaga igihugu biyerekana.
Ati ”Kuba bampisemo ni iby’agaciro gakomeye kandi byarigaragazaga, biranejeje kandi nta muntu utanezerezwa n’insinzi.”
Mama Nick na we wagarageye muri filime zitandukanye ariko akaba izina rye ryaramenyekanye bitewe na filime ya City Maid, yagize ikiniga ubwo yahamagarwaga ko ari we wegukanye igihembo cy’umugore ukunzwe kurusha abandi.
Ati ”Iyo nishimye ikiniga kiramfata, iki gihembo ngituye Abanyarwanda bose kuko bambaye hafi bambwira ngo Mama komeza kandi bose barantoye.”
Gutora umukinnyi wa filime ukunzwe n’abantu benshi byakorwaga biciye kuri internet, aho byari bifite amanota 40% n’uburyo wakiriwe n’abantu mu rugendo bakoze bazenguruka ibice bitandukanye by’igihugu bigaragariza abakunzi babo bikagira 60%.
Mu bindi bihembo byatwawe  Bamenya Series yatwaye igihembo cya internet web, Seburikoko itwara igihembo cya filime  y’umwaka ndetse n’icya Tv series, best supporting actor yabaye Rugero Norbert uzwi nka Digi Digi, best supporting actress yabaye Munezero Aline ukina muri Bamenya.
Umukinnyi mwiza mpuzamahanga mu bagabo yabaye George, ni umunyaKenya, mu bagore UmunyaUgandakazi umukinnyi Karinda Isai yaragitwaye.
Ibi bihembo kandi byitabiriwe n’abantu bafite aho bahurira na cinema mu Burundi, Tanzania, Kenya na Uganda.
NICOLAS Yusuf

Title: Abahanzi bakomeye bazataramira i Ngoma na Kirehe ku Munsi Mpuzamahanga w’Umugore
Body:
*Radio Izuba na Izuba TV biyemeje kuzamura imyidagaduri binyuze mu bitaramo
Ubuyobozi bwa Radio Izuba na Izuba TV bwateguye igitaramo kizaba ku cyumweru tariki 8 Werurwe ku Munsi Mpuzamahanga w’Umugore, kikaba kizabera muri Stade ya Ngoma.
Iki gitaramo kiri muri gahunda yo gufasha abatuye Akarere kwidagadurana n’abahanzi basanzwe bumva ariko bikaba bitajya biborohera kubabona amaso ku yandi.
Ubuyobozi bwa Association ADECCO ari na bo ba nyiri Radio na Televeziyo Izuba buvuga ko bugiye gushyira imbaraga nyinshi mu kuzamura imyitagaduro mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba iki gitangazamakuru gikoreramo.
Ubusanzwe Intara y’Iburasirazuba ubona ko yasigaye inyuma ku bijyanye n’imyidagaduro aho binagoranye kubona inzu z’imyidagaduro muri iki gice.
Uretse ibitaramo byo ku rwego rw’igihugu bikunze kuhaca nka rimwe mu mwaka, ubundi biragoranye kugira ngo uzumve umuntu runaka wateguye igitaramo kandi bijya bigaragara ko abaturage bakunda imyidagaduro cyane.
Igitaramo cyabasusurutsaga ni cyabaga rimwe mu mwaka cya PGGSS kitarahagarara.
Ubuyobozi bwa ADECCO ku ikubitiro batangiriye mu Karere ka Ngoma na Kirehe bazamura imyidagaduro, ku Munsi Mpuzamahanga w’Abagore uzaba ku cyumweru tariki 8 Werurwe 2020 igitaramo kirimo abahanzi banyuranye kizabera muri Stade nshya y’Akarere ka Ngoma.
Kizatangira saa 13h00 z’amanywa hanyuma bazakomereze mu Karere ka Kirehe mu masaha y’ijoro guhera saa 19h00 (After Party) muri Kirehe Guest House.
Abahanzi bazitabira igitaramo barimo Masamba Intore, Nsengiyumva Francois (Igisupusupu), Sgt Major Robert, Eric Senderi na Orhchestre Impala.
Aba baziyongeraho bamwe mu bahanzi bakizamuka bo mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba nka Camarade Uwizeye uzwi nka PEN KING, B-PAC Rugamba wiyita Umwami w’I Gisaka, Reponse, Aloys Lopez n’abandi.
Kwinjira muri iki gitaramo ni ibihumbi bitanu (5,000Frw) muri VVIP, 2,000Frw muri VIP, 1,000Frw ahasigaye hose na 500Frw ku banyeshuri bafite ikarita y’ishuri.
Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa wa ADECCO Murayire Protais yabwiye Umuseke ko gahunda biyemeje yo kuzamura imyidagaduro mu Ntara y’Iburasirazuba itagomba guhagarara.
Ati “Nyuma yo kubona ko imyidagaduro mu Ntara ikenewe twiyemeje kujya dutegura bene ibi bitaramo nibura kimwe muri buri gihembwe kandi tukazazenguruka uturerere twose tw’Intara.”
Elia BYUKUSENGE
UMUSEKE.RW/Ngoma

Title: Adrien na Gentil Misigaro bafite impungenge zo kuzasubira USA kubera coronavirus
Body:
Abahanzi b’indirimbo zihimbaza Imana Adrien na Gentil Misigaro  bavuga ko kuba icyorezo cya coronavirus  cyarageze muri USA ari imbogamizi kuri bo kuko kuzasubirayo bizabagora. Yemeza ko iki cyorezo kiri gukoma mu nkokora ibikorwa byinshi cyane harimo ibihuriza hamwe abantu benshi.
Ati: “Ni ikibazo kibangamiye abantu ahantu henshi. Gishobora gutera ikibazo icyo ari cyo cyose gusa nk’abakozi b’Imana twizera ishobora byose izakiturinda.”
Ashima ingamba  Leta y’u Rwanda yafashe  harimo no gusuzuma abinjira n’abasohoka ko bafite ibimenyetso birimo n’umuriro mwinshi.
Kugeza ubu ntabwo kiriya cyorezo kiragera mu Rwanda.
Adrien Misigaro ari mu Rwanda  mu rwego rwo gutegura igitaramo afatanyije na Gentil Misigaro kitwa EACH ONE REACH ONE kigamije kurwanya ikoreshwa ry’ibiyobyabwenge.
Coronavirus imaze guhitana abarenga ibimbi bitatu (3000) benshi biganje mu Bushinwa.
Nicolas YUSUF                     UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Ndifuza kukwegera kurushaho- Charly& Nina mu ndirimbo nshya ‘Ibirenze ibi’
Body:
Charly na Nina bashyize hanze indirimbo yabo ya mbere muri uyu mwaka wa 2020 yitwa ‘Ibirenze ibi’ baririmbamo ubutumwa bw’umuntu ubwira umukunzi we ko yifuza kumukorera ibirenzi ibyo asanzwe amukorera akamwegera kurushaho…
Iyi ndirimbo yasohotse mu buryo bw’amajwi aherekejwe n’amagambo yanditse (Lyrics) ikubiyemo ubutumwa bw’urukundo bw’umwe mu bakundana abwira umukunzi we amagambo yuzuyuye urukundo.
Batangira bagira bati “ibyo ngukorera mbona ari bikeya ni nk’agatonyanga kamwe mu Nyanja, nzaharanira ibirenze ibi…”
Aba bakobwa banyujije ubutumwa kuri Instagram bahamagarira abakunzi babo kumva iyi ndirimbo yabo nshya bakoze kuva uyu mwaka wa 2020 watangira.
Bagize bati “Muraho bakunzi ba Charly na Nina hamwe na muzika nyarwanda muri rusange Mutwemerere tubagezeho igihangano cyacu gishya twise Ibirenze Ibi.”
Aba bakobwa bari bamaze amezi ane badashyira hanze indirimbo, baheruka gusohora iyo bise Umuti mu Ukwakira 2019.
Muri iyi ndirimbo nshya ‘ibirenze ibi’, Charly na Nina bakomeza bagira bati “Ntagipimo ntarengwa cyo kugukunda mpora nifuza gukora ibirenze nakwegera kurushaho nagukunda birenze ibi watera intambwe ngatera indi hehe no kwifuza hehe no kwigunga.”
Nicolas YUSUF
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Papa Sava arasaba Purukeriya kugaruka, undi ati “abanze akemura icyatumye anyirukana”
Body:
Niyitegeka Gratien AKA Papa Sava arasaba Rosine Bazongere cyangwa Purukeriya uherutse kwirukanwa muri Film Papa Sava kugaruka kuko n’ubundi atamwirukanye ahubwo yari yamuhagaritse, undi na we akavuga ko kugaruka bishoboka ariko ko babanza bakaganira bagakemura ikibazo n’ubundi yari yazamuye ku bijyanye n’amasezerano y’akazi.
Iyirukanwa rya Purukeriya muri Papa Sava ryari rimaze iminsi rivugwa mu bitangazamakuru bitandukanye ndetse uriya mugore we yivugiye ko Papa Sava yamwirukanye atamuteguje.
Aganira na kimwe mu binyamakuru bikorera mu Rwanda, Rosine AKA Purukeriya yagize ati “Navuyemo ntanteguza, navuyemo atambwiye, nti nakosheje iki?”
Papa Sava na we wagiye agira icyo avuga mu Itangazamakuru, yari yavuze ko yirukanye uriya mugore amuziza imyitwarire mibi muri bagenzi be.
Purukeriya we akavuga ko ntakosa yari yakoze ryo gutuma yirukanwa uretse ko yari yasabye guhabwa amasezerano y’akazi mu gukina muri iriya Film kandi ko ari byo yabonaga byatuma irushaho gutera imbere.
Yagize ati “Eraga iyo ufite amasezerano ibikorwa ukora ubikora nk’ibyawe kandi uba utuje.”
Uriya mugore wumvikanaga nk’uwarakajwe no kuba yarirukanywe, yari yanavuze ko bidakwiye ko Papa Sava ashyira umukinnyi muri Film ye uko abishaka cyangwa akamukuramo uko yishakiye.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’Umuseke, Papa Sava yavuze ko atirukanye uriya munyarwandakazi ahubwo ko yamuhagaritse kubera imyitwarire ye mibi irimo gutongana na bagenzi be bakinana ndetse no kutaboneka uko akenewe.
Ati “Ni nko mu muryango umuntu yakosa bakamuhana.”
Avuga ko uriya munyarwandakazi yacisha macye akagaruka. Ati “Nacishe make  yongere agaruke ikindi ni umukobwa n’umubyeyi dukina ibintu by’ikinamico iby’impinduka mu gukina yakabaye abyumva na we.”
Papa Sava avuga ko yababajwe cyane no kubona Rosine yaragiye hanze akavuga ko bamwirukanye kandi ibyo bamwandikiye bajya kumuhagarika byose yarabisomye.
Papa Sava akomeza avuga ko ubuzima ari nk’ubwato amazi yinjiramo andi agasohoka ko kuba yava muri iyi film ntanigikuba cyaba cyacitse.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’Umuseke, Purukeriya yavuze ko iyi filime atifuzaga kuyivamo kuko yari imaze kumwubakira izina.
Avuga ko kuyisubiramo byashoboka ariko ko byabanza bigaca mu biganiro ndetse bakabanza kumvikana ku bijyanye n’imikoranire.
Ati “Ndi umukinnyi wa film narayikundaga nyifitemo abakunzi benshi ntacyambuza gukomeza ibintu biciye mu buryo, hari ibyatumye tudakomezanya biramutse bikosowe ntacyo bitwaye.”
Nicolas YUSUF
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Nzacurangira abantu si imbwa- DJ Miller abwira abibaza ku Gitaramo Dog Show azacurangamo
Body:
Karuranga Vilgire umaze kumenyerwa mu kazi ko kuvanga imiziki ku izina rya Dj Miller azitabira igitaramo kiswe Dog Show kizaba kirimo imbwa, yavuze ko azaba ari gucurangira abantu bazakitabira aho kuba imbwa nubwo na zo zizaba zihari.
Dj Miller azacuranga muri kiriya gitaramo Dog Show kizabera mu mujyi wa Kigali muri Kamena uyu mwaka.
Nta muhanzi uzaririmbamo ahubwo hazacurangwamo imiziki ndetse hanamurikirwemo imbwa zigaragaza ubumenyi zifite.
Abakurikirana iby’imyidagaduro mu Rwanda bakunze gukoresha imbuga nkoranyambaga, bakomeje kukigarukaho banagitangaho ibitekerezo binyuranye.
Bamwe bibaza niba Dj Miller azacurangira imbwa, abandi bati “DJ Miller mu gitaramo k’imbwa,…”
Uyu muvangamiziki uherutse gukora ubukwe, ntiyishimiye ibi bitekerezo, atanga ibisobanuro byimbitse kuri kiriya gitaramo kizaba mu mpeshyi.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’Umuseke yagize ati “Ni  igitaramo cy’abantu bakunda n’abatunze imbwa ni bo nzacurangira ntabwo nzacurangira imbwa.”
Abari gutegura iki gitaramo bavuga ko kizaba kiba buri mwaka, kikazajya kigamije kwerekana ubushobozi bw’imbwa mu bikorwa zisanzwe zikora nko mu buvuzi no mu mitoreze.
Ngo mu Rwanda ibi ibi bitaramo ntibimenyerewe ariko abantu bari banyotewe n’ibi birori cyane ko mu bihugu byateye imbere bisanzwe biba.
Nicolas YUSUF
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Byinshi kuri Papa Sava: Izina ry’impine, igitekerezo cyavuguruwe inshuro eshatu,…
Body:
Niyitegeka Gratien uzwi nka Papa Sava kubera Film y’uruhererekane akinamo yitwa gutya, yatuganirije byinshi ku gitekerezo k’iyi film ndetse n’uburyo yagiye ahura na bamwe mu bakinnyi bayikinamo barimo Ndimbati umaze kuyamamaramo.
Uyu musore wamenyakanye muri zitandukanye nka Seburikoko, avuga ko igitekerezo cya Papa Sava ubu ica kuri Youtube yakize ashaka kujya akina ibijyanye n’Umuco.
Ngo yari kujya yibanda ku nsigamigani zitandukanye zirimo igira iti “Impama itazakugeza i Kigali uyirira ku Ruyenzi”, “utazi akaraye ifumbwe araza ifu”.
Nyuma yabonye atapfa kubona ibikoresho bijyanye n’ibyo hambere, aza guhindura igitekerezo.
Ngo yifuzaga ko ibi azajya abikora nk’imivugo izajya ica kuri Youtube ndetse ahita ageragereza ku gakino kamenyekanye kitwa ‘Ubyibuha ute unyambuye’, nyuma aza kubona ko bidahagije ni ko guhita afata umwanzuro wo kujya abikinamo Film afatanyije n’abandi.
Izina ry’iyi Film ‘Papa Sava’ benshi bakeka ko ari nk’umupapa w’umwana witwa Sava, avuga ko atari cyo bisobanuye ahubwo ko ari impine y’imvugo Papa du Savoir.
Papa sava avuga ko ajya guhitamo izina papa sava hatekerejwe uburyo bwa gihanzi bugamije gushyira urujijo mu bantu byitwa kuzimiza.
Ati “Papa sava ntabwo ari Se wa Sava ahubwo Papa Sava ni Papa du savoir mu ndimi z’amahanga bivuze umuntu ushobora gushungura ibintu ariko agamije gutanga ubutumwa mu bantu .”
Ngo abantu bakomeje kuyita kwiyumvisha ko iriya nyito iba ivuga umubyeyi w’umwana witwa Sava, ahita ashyira mu ngiro ikifuzo cyabo ahita ashyiramo abakinafilimi b’ababyeyi ba Sava ndetse na Sava ubwe ariko nyuma aza gukuramo uriya mwana.
 
Ndimbati umaze kuba icyamamare bahuye bate?
Ngo bahujwe na Siperansiya bakinana muri Seburikoko, amubwira uburyo uriya mugabo akunda Film, ahita asaba Papa Sava kumushyira muri iriya film.
Icyo gihe bahise batangirana mu gakino ka ‘Ubyibuha ute unyambuye’ ngo abona abikoze neza ahita anamukinisha mu bindi bice byakurikiyeho.
Ngo abakinnyi bamutunguye kubera imikinire yabo muri iriya film ni Digidigi na Marigarita akaba umugore wa Ndimbati muri iriya film.
Nicolas YUSUF
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Platini mu rugendo rushya n’izina rishya ubu ni P…Ngo ibya Dream Boyz byararangiye
Body:
Nemeye Platini wahoze mu itsinda rya Dream Boyz, mu buryo bweruye yashyize yemera ko ubu iby’iri tsinda bisa nk’amateka kuko ubu yatangiye kwikorana umuziki ndetse ubu akaba yarahinfuye izina ubu asigaye yitwa P.
Byavuzwe mu minsi yashize ubwo hasohoka indirimbo buri umwe yaba Platini na TMC bakoze ku giti cyabo, ariko bombi ntibakwerura ko batakiri kumwe nk’itsinda.
Mu cyumweru gishize, TMC we yuriye rutemikire yerekeza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika bivugwa ko agiye gukomerezayo amasomo.
Platini na we amaze iminsi agaragara mu bitaramo byazengurutse mu bice binyuranye ari wenyine.
Ibi bitaramo byabaye mu cyumweru gishize ubwo habaga Tour du Rwanda, bisoje Platini yeruye koi bye na TMC byarangiye nk’itsinda ryo kuririmba.
Ati “Ntabwo aho imyaka igeze tubona viziyo kimwe buri wese afite intumbero ye gusa icyiza ni uko turi abavandimwe.”
Yavuze ko ibikorwa bya buri wese bizagaragara nubwo we ibye bizaguma muri muzika kuko uyu mwaka agiye kwibanda ku ndirimbo ze gusa.
Yasabye ko abamamaza ibikorwa bya Dream Boyz babihagarika bakamamaza izina rye kuko muri iyi minsi atari kwitwa Platini ahubwo asigaye yitwa P.
Avuga ko yabanje kugorwa no kujya ku rubyiniro atari kumwe na TMC ariko ko yatunguwe no kubona abafana bamwishimiye cyane.
Aba basore bamaze imyaka 11 bagize itsinda Dream Boys ryanegukanye PGGSS nk’irushanwa rikomeye ryabayeho muri muzika nyarwanda ndetse bakoze Album esheshatu bamurikiye abakunzi babo.
Nicolas YUSUF
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Coronavirus yatumaga Riderman akumbura cyane u Rwanda
Body:
Gatsinzi Emery umuraperi ubirambyemo hano mu Rwanda uzwi nka Riderman avuga ko icyorezo gihangayikishije Isi muri iyi minsi cya Coronavirus yagitekerezagaho bikamutera gukumbura mu rugo.
Riderman ku wa gatanu nibwo yagarutse i Kigali avuye gukorere igitaramo ku mugabene w’Uburayi mu gihugu cy’Ububiligi aho yari yajyanye n’umuhanzikazi Marina ndetse na Social Mura kuva tariki 20 Gashyantare 2020.
Riderman ubwo aganira n’Umuseke yadutangarije ko icyorezo cya Coronavirus kimaze guhitana abataribake cyane mu gihugu cy’Ubushinwa  ari na ho cyaturutse ko cyamuteraga ubwoba.
Avuga ko mu Bufaransa ahaturanye n’Ububiligi bari baherereyomo naho habonetse abantu bamaze kwandura kiriya cyoroze n’ubwo aho yari ari cyari kitarahagera.
Ati “Nayitekerezagaho kuko nko mu Bufaransa hegereye Ububiligi kandi hari abantu bari bayivuzweho ntiwabura kubitekereza usibye ko utahagarika ubuzima burundu.”
Avuga ko iki cyorezo kugeza ubu kimaze kwibasira ibihugu bitandukanye byo muri Aziya  no ku mugabane  w’Uburayi ndetse hari ahabonetse umurwayi muri Africa nko muri Nigeria na Misiri, ngo byatumaga akumbura mu Rwanda.
Ati “Nageze aho nkumbura mu rugo, nkumbura abavandimwe n’inshuti nubwo tutamazeyo igihe kirekire.”
Ngo yagerageje gukurikiza amabwirizwa bahabwaga kugira ngo abashe kwirinda icyorezo kimaze gutwara ubuzima bw’abasaga 2700 ku Isi.
Avuga ko ikindi cyamugoye ubwo yari i Burayi ari imbeho nyinshi kuko muri iki gihe bari ubukonje.
Riderman abaye umwe mu baririmbyi bake bo mu Rwanda mu njyana ya HipHop bakoreye ibitaramo ku mugabane w’Uburayi nyuma ya Jay Polly.
Riderman Avuga ko imishinga yo gukomeza  gukorera ibitaramo hanze y’u Rwanda igikomeje nubwo hakiri kare ngo abe yagira icyo abitangazaho.
NICOLAS YUSUF
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Phionah yatunguwe no kubona Miss Rwanda 2020 abaye Nishimwe Naomie
Body:
Umwiza Phionah Wabaye igisonga cya mbere cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko atigeze abona ko  Nishimwe Naomie azegukana ikamba rya nyampinga.
Mu gihe aba bakobwa bari mu mwiherero i Nyamata havugwaga byinshi hagati yabo ku muntu babona ushobora kuzaba Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020.
Iki gihe buri muntu yacishaga amaso mu bo bari kurushanwa akabona abamuteye ubwoba bashobora kuzamubuza kwegukana ikamba.
Umwiza Phiona avuga ko hari abakobwa benshi bagaragazaga ko ari bo bakwiye kuba Nyampinga kurenza uko yari gukeka ko Naomie yakwambara ikamba.
Ati “Numvaga ko azaba umukobwa ukunzwe cyane, cyangwa Miss ubereye kwifotoza neza nta bindi, kuko muri boot camp ntibyari byoroshye.”
Nyampinga w’u  Rwanda Nishimwe Naomie na we yunga mu ry’igisonga ke ko abakobwa babanaga mu mwiherero bakundaga kumuca intege ko atazaza no mu bisonga cyane cyane uyu witwa Phionah.
Phionah yari yamaze gutanga ikamba rya Miss Rwanda ku bandi bakobwa babanaga mu mwiherero barimo Akaliza Hope n’Umutoni Denise utarigeze akomeza mu 10 batoranyijwemo Nyampinga.
Phionah we, kuba igisonga cya mbere avuga ko nta cyo bimutwaye ndetse ko ashimira Imana kuba ataratahiye aho  cyane ko nta kizere yari afite cyo gutsinda.
Umwiza Phionah yabaye igisonga cya mbere cya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda ahembwa miliyoni 1.2Frw no kujya kuba muri hotel imwe i Nyamata igihe cy’amezi atandatu.
Ngo ababyeyi be bamubwiye amagambo menshi amaze gutsindira kuba igisonga cya mbere cya Nyampinga,  yamwubatse.
Ati “Ikintu kimwe banyibukije ni ugohora nkunda Imana ngo nubwo mbonye ibyo byose.”
Uyu mukobwa avuga ko azakora neza umushinga wo kurwanya ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina rikorerwa abangavu.
Nicolas YUSUF 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Utegura  Kigali Jazzy Junction  yagaragaje uruhare rwayo mu iterambere ry’imyidagaduro mu Rwanda
Body:
Remmy Rubega utegura  Kigali Jazz Junction iki kikaba ari igitaramo ngarukakwezi  gitumirwamo umuhanzi wo hanze agafatanya  nabo mu Rwanda avuga ko ifite uruhare runini rwaho imyidagaduro igeze k’umunsi wanone.
Muri Gashyantare, 2020  iki gitaramo cyatumiwemo JoeBoy wo muri Nijeria.
Uyu muhanzi ubu ari i Kigali akazafatanya na  Davis D Shine Boy na Niyo Bosco.
Rubega avuga ko iki gitaramo cyatangiye gahoro gahoro kigenda gitera imbere ndetse kugeza ubu ngo gikorwa na nijoro.
Avuga ko kuba  abahanzi bo hanze bitabira kiriya gitaramo bakaririmbana n’Abanyarwanda bibafasha kumenyana bikabaviramo gukorana indirimbo.
Ati:”…Jules Sentore yakoranye n’umuhanzi kazi wo muri Uganda,  Bruce melodie  akorana n’umunyanigeria, n’abandi gutyo, gutyo…”
Avuga ko Seka Live igitaramo cy’urwenya ngaruka kwezi nacyo gifite aho gihuriye na Kigali Jazz Jucnction  ubu ngubu kimaze kumenyw ano gukundwa na benshi .
Avuga ko iki gitaramo umuhanzi  wacyitabiriye kimwongerera kwigirira icyizere bikamufasha nawe gutegurira igitaramo ku giti cye.
Urugero ngo ni Yverry uherutse gutegura igitaramo cyo kumurika Album nawe watumiwe muri Jazz Junction umwaka ushize.
Ngo baracyafite byinshi byo  gukora mu gihe kiri imbere mu rwego rwo guteza imbere umuziki n’imyidagaduro mu Rwanda.
Nicolas YUSUF 
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Yvanny Mpano avuga ko Yverry yamwigishije kwihangana bikamufasha
Body:
Mutangana Yves uzwi ku izina ry’ubuhanzi rya Yvanny Mpano, ni umwe mu baririmbyi b’indirimbo zituje zibanda ku rukundo, avuga ko iyo ataza kugira Rugamba Yverry mu buzima bwe bwa buri munsi aba yaravuye mu muzika rugikubita.
Uyu muririmbyi wiganye na Yverry kuva mu mashuri abanza no ku ishuri rya muzika ryo ku Nyundo, avuga ko impano iruta amafaranga ariko kwihangana bikaruta impano.
Yvanny ngo yari afite urukundo rwa muzika ariko kwihangana ndetse no gutegereza muri we byari bike, ariko Yverry yamukomeje umutima bituma adahagarika umuziki.
Ati “Hari igihe cyageze nkiva ku Nyundo numva bitazavamo neza, ndamubwira nti ‘njye ndumva ngiye kuba nigiriye hanze, arambwira ati ‘uburetse gatoya’. Kwihangana ni kimwe mu bintu nigiye kuri Yverry.”
Uyu muhanzi  kuba adasohora indirimbo nyinshi ngo ni uko indirimbo nziza ihenda bikaba bimutera kwitondera gushyira hanze indirimbo uko abonye kuko aba atifuza gusohora igihangano kiri hasi y’icyakibanjirije.
Avuga ko yinjiye mu muziki ababyeyi batabyumva neza gusa ashima Imana kuba umuziki we utanga ikizere ndetse n’abangaga ko awujyamo basigaye bamushyigikira .
yvvanny impano ari gutunganya Album ya mbere izaba igizwe n’indirimbo 11, amaze kuyikoraho indirimbo eshanu zirimo ‘Ndabigukundira’ yakunzwe na benshi, hari ‘Venti Venti’ ndetse n’iyitwa ‘Amateka’ ari gutunganyiriza amashusho.
Yvanny na Yverry ni bamwe mu banyeshuru barangije bwa mbere mu ishuri rya muzika ryo ku Nyundo bakaba bakora n’indirombo ziri mu bwoko bwa RnB.
Nicolas YUSUF
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Abahanzi ba Gospel n’abakoresheje ibiyobyabwenge bishyize hamwe ngo babirwanye
Body:
Adrien Misigaro uririmba indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana akaba asanzwe aba muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za America yateguye ubukangurambaga azahurizamo abandi bahanzi bakomeye muri gospel ndetse n’abandi barimo abakoresheje ibiyobyabwenge kugira ngo babirwanye mu bana b’u Rwanda.
Muri ubu bukangurambaga bwiswe ‘Each one reach one’, Adrien Misigaro n’umuvandimwe we Gentil Misigaro, ndetse na Islael Mbonyi bazatangirira ibi bikorwa mu gitaramo kizaba tariki ya 08 Werurwe.
Adrien Misigaro yabwiye Umuseke ko ikibazo cy’ibiyobyabwenge giteye inkeke muri iyi minsi kandi kikaba kiganje mu rubyiruko rutezweho u Rwanda rw’ejo.
Uyu muhanzi uheruka no gusura ikigo k’Iwawa kigorora abiganjemo abakoresheje ibiyobyabwenge, avuga ko yavuyeyo atekereza icyo yakora kugira ngo urubyiruko rudakomeza kwijandika muri izi ngeso mbi.
Ati “Twahisemo gukora ubukanguramba bwamagana ibiyobyabwenge.”
Muri ubu bukangurambaga, hazaba n’ibindi bizabera mu bice bitandukanye by’igihugu.
Abahanzi bazakora ubu bukangurambaga bazibanda mu bigo by’amashuri kuko ari ho hari urubyiruko rwinshi ruba rushobora kugwa mu mutego wo gukoresha ibiyobyabwenge.
Adrien Misigaro kandi azifashisha abahanzi baririmba indirimbo zisanzwe barimo Gisa Cyinganzo wigeze gufungirwa kunywa ibiyobyabwenge na Fire Man uherutse kuva kugororerwa Iwawa.
Iki gikorwa cyatangiye umwaka ushize, Adrien Misigaro avuga ko kimaze kugira impinduka mu rubyiruko kuko mu mushinga we harimo urubyiruko rwahoze rukoresha ibiyobyabwenge ubu rukomeje kwiteza imbere kandi rukanamufasha muri ubu bukangurambaga.
Nicolas YUSUF
UMUSEKE.RW

Title: Couple yaririmbye ‘Mpa Amavuta’ ije mu gitaramo cyo kubera urugero abashakanye
Body:
James Rutagarama n’umugore we Daniella Rutagarama baririma indirimbo zo guhimbaza Imana bagiye gukora igitaramo kizahuriramo abandi bahanzi b’ibyamamare na bo basanzwe babana nk’umugore n’umugabo barimo Kavutse Olivier n’umugore we Amanda. Ngo iki gitaramo gifite intego eshatu zikomeye zirimo kwerera imbuto abashakanye kugira ngo na bo binjire mu murimo wo gukorera Imana.
Iki gitaramo bitiriye indirimbo yabo ‘Mpa Amavuta’ yakunzwe cyane, kizanamurikirwamo album yabo ya mbere igizwe n’indirimbo umunani baririmbye bari kumwe nk’itsinda.
James Rutagarama avuga ko abakunzi b’itsinda ryabo basanzwe bababone ku mbuga nkoranyambaga no mu nsengero, bagiye bagaragaza ko bishimira umuryango wabo ku buryo biri mu byatumye bakomeza kuberera imbuto imbonankubone.
Ati “Batubona dufite iminota cumi n’itanu cyangwa makumyabiri ariko ubu kubana na bo amasaha atatu, ane, atanu hari ubusabane buzabaho butandukanye n’ubwo twabonanaga nabo mu nsengero cyangwa kuri Youtube.”
Avuga kandi ko kiriya gitaramo kizaba cyuzuye umwuka w’Imana kizabera umusemburo w’abashakanye kurushaho gukundana kuko umuryango wubakiye ku Mana uba ufite urufatiro rutajegajega.
Ati “Maze imyaka itanu mu rushako, mu rugo habamo imbogamizi nyinshi kuko aba ari umuntu umwe wavuye mu rugo rumwe n’undi wavuye mu rundi bafite uko bateye gutandukanye, haba hakenewe ko Imana ibijyamo kugira ngo bashobore kubana neza…Ntibishoboka ko wakunda umuntu cyane udakunda Imana cyane.”
Kiriya gitaramo kandi kizaririmbamo andi matsinda aririmba indirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza Imana agizwe n’abasanzwe babana nk’umugore n’umugabo nka Kavutse Olivier na Amanda, Dorcas na Papy Claver, Maya na Fabrice na couple ya Chance na Ben.
James avuga ko imwe mu ntego y’iki gitaramo ari ukubera urugero izindi ‘Couples’ na zo zikinjira mu rugendo rwo gukorera Imana kuko biri mu byatumye ibahuza.
Ati “Imana yaduhaye umutima wo kuramya twifuza ko wagera no mu bandi benshi.”
Aba bahanzi bamaze imyaka itanu babana nk’umugore n’umugabo akaba ari na yo bamaranye bakora umuziki nk’itsinda, bavuga ko kuririmbana byabafashije gukomeza inkuta zubatse urukundo rwabo.
Daniella Rutagarama avuga ko kuba akorana n’umugabo we bituma igihe cyose baba bari kumwe kuko iyo bavuye mu nshingano z’urugo bahita binjira mu bikorwa by’umuziki.
Ati “Kugira ngo dutange ibihango byiza ni uko tuba dutunganye mu mitima yacu, ntabwo twajya gutanga ubutumwa bwiza ahantu twe ubwacu tutameze neza mu mitima yacu cyangwa hari ibyo tutumvikanyeho ngo ubutumwa bwacu bugende neza.”
Iki gitaramo kizaba Tariki ya 01 Werurwe 2020 muri Kigari Arena, kizanitabirwa n’abandi bahanzi bakomeye mu ndirimbo zo kuramya no guhimbaza, barimo Gabby Kamanzi, True Promises na Prosper Nkomezi.
Hazanatangwa n’ubutumwa bw’abakozi b’Imana bakomeye mu Rwanda barimo Antoine Rutayisire, Hortense Mazimpaka  na Bishop Masengo.

Title: Miss Naomie yasobanuye icyatumye agira amanota make, na we ngo ntiyayishimiye
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie wabaye Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020 yavuze ko uburwayi ari yo impamvu yatumye abona amanota mabi mu bizamini bya Leta bisoza umwaka wa gatandutu w’amashuri yisumbuye.
Minisiteri y’Uburezi ubwo yatangazaga amanota y’abanyeshuri barangije umwaka wa gatandatu w’ayisumbuye 2019, ku wa mbere tariki 24 Gashyantare, Nyampinga w’u Rwanda yarangije mu bandi ariko abona amanota ‘atamwemerera kugira Kaminuza’ yigaho mu Rwanda, yagize amanota 13/73, harimo aho yagize F.
Ubusanzwe kugira ngo umuntu yakirwe na Kaminuza, iyo yize Science agomba kuba yaragize nibura amanota 18, uwize andi masomo asabwa kuba yaragize amanota 24/73.
Miss Naomie Nishimwe yabwiye RBA ko amanota yabonye  atayishimiye, ngo si we byaturutseho.
Ati “Amanota ni ayange, sinayakiriye neza. Uko mwayabonye ni ko nayabonye, nta kindi nabihinduraho.”
Akomeza agira ati “Sinabigira urwitwazo, ariko umwaka wange ntiwari woroshye kuko nagize ikibazo cyo kurwara, gusa ndashimira Imana kuba nkiriho.”
Avuga ko atiteguye gusubira kwiga mu mashuri yisumbuye kugira ngo abashe kugira amanota meza, ngo intego ye ni ugukomeza amasomo ye muri Kaminuza .
Avuga ko kugeza ubu ari guhura n’imbogamizi z’abantu bamuvuga uko bashatse harimo n’abamuca intege, gusa ngo nta zacibwa intege n’abavuga ibyo bashaka kuko bazahora ho.
Icyo Miss Rwanda 2020 ashyize imbere ni ibikorwa bye.
Naomie w’imyaka 19  arangirije amashuri yisumbuye mu Kigo kitwa Glory Secondary School mu ishami ry’Imibare, Ubukungu n’Ubumenyi bw’Isi (Maths, Economics and Geography, MEG).
Yatsindiye ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda ahigitse abakobwa 18 bari bahatanye.
Mu Mwiherero w’Abayobozi Bakuru b’Igihugu wabereye i Gabiro tariki 16-19 mu byo baganiriyeho harimo n’Uburezi, umwe mu myanzuro bafashe ni uko nta munyeshuri uzongera kwimurwa atatsinze.
Perezida Paul Kagame mu ijambo rifungura umwiherero yanenze cyane Kaminuza zititaye ku ireme ry’Uburezi ahubwo zishyira imbere amafaranga.

Title: Alto yasohoye indirimbo nshya yise ‘Ndacyagukunda’
Body:
Dusabe Eric uzwi nka Alto yasohoye indirimbo ‘Ndacyagukunda’ abifashijwemo na Label ya Ladies Empere yashinzwe ya Oda Paccy.
Iyi ndirimbo yumvikanamo amagambo y’urukundo, umuhungu abwira umukobwa batandukanye akajya kwishakira undi musore amwibutsa ko amukumbuye.
Alto ni umwe mubahanzi basigaye muri label ya Oda Paccy nyuma yo kuvugurura imikorere ikanahindurirwa izina ikitwa Ladies Empire.
Oda Paccy yabwiye Umuseke ko Alto batangiye gukorana muri Kamena 2019 kuva ubwo batangiye kumubonamo impano n’ubuhanga ari na byo bashingiyeho bifuza kumufasha banamuzamura mu buhanzi bwe.
Kugeza ubu Alto amaze gukora indirimbo enye zirimo iyitwa ‘Bye Bye’, ‘Uzansaza’, ‘Turakundana’, n’iyitwa ‘Ndacyagukunda’ ari na yo aheruka gusohora muri Audio n’amashusho.
Alto atangiye gukorana na Label ya Oda Paccy yatangiye kujya yitabira ibitaramo bitandukanye harimo icyo kumurika Album ya Yverry  ‘I LOVE YOU MORE.’
Oda Paccy yavuze ko Label ye ari umuryango mugari kandi ko bafite imishinga myinshi bifuza gukora muri uyu mwaka.
Ati “Twiteguye ko iyi mishinga izagenda neza, turashimira itangazamakuru uko rikomeje kutuba hafi.”
Kanda hano wumve indirimbo ya Alto yise ‘Ndacyagukunda’

Title: Hari abakeka ko ubwo Miss Rwanda 2020 yatorwaga, iby’ubwenge bititaweho cyane
Body:
Nyuma y’uko Naomie Nishimwe atorewe kuba nyampinga w’u Rwanda muri 2020 bidateye kabiri hagasohoka amanota y’ibizamini bya Leta yerekana ko atabonye amanota y’abahanga, hari bamwe bakemanga ubushobozi bwe mu bwenge n’ireme ry’umushinga avuga azakora.
Miss Naomie Nishimwe yigaga mu Kigo cy’amashuri yisumbuye cya Glory Secondary School
Amanota yatangajwe kuri uyu wa Mbere n’ikigo cy’igihugu cy’uburezi, REB, yerekanye ko Naomie Nishimwe yabonye amanota 13/73, aya akaba ari amanota make.
Hari bamwe bibajije niba mu gutora no kwemeza ko uyu mukobwa w’imyaka 19 y’amavuko haba hatarabaye kwirengagiza ingingo y’ubwenge iri mu zindi eshatu zibandwaho iyo batora nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
Ingingo  eshatu zigenderwaho basuzuma kandi bakemeza ko kanaka ariwe uhabwa ikamba rya nyampinga w’u Rwanda ni Ubwenge, Ubwiza n’Umuco.
Kuri Twitter kandi uwibajije uko umushinga wa Nishimwe uzaba ukoze.
Kuri we ngo umuntu wabonye amanota angana kuriya byamugora gukora umushinga runaka awikoreye ubwe.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko, hari abavuga ko abantu badakweriye gukwena uriya mukobwa ahubwo yafashwa gukora ibyo azi neza kandi ashoboye kuko ngo hari n’abantu bakomeye ku isi bagejeje ibihugu byabo ku majyambere kandi bataraminuje.

Title: Gasumuni ‘ntiyazimye’ arasaba abakora urwenya kuruhuza n’ubuzima bw’abo basetsa
Body:
Umunyarwenya Ntarindwa Diogene wamanyekanye nka Atome cyangwa Gasumuni yasabye abakora urwenya nyarwanda kwibanda ku byo Abanyarwanda bahuriraho ko ari byo bya bafasha kwigarurira imitima y’abakunda  urwenya.
Gasumuni w’imyaka 43 avuga ko bidashoboka ko wajya gusetsa abenegihugu maze ukabaha urwenya rutandukanye n’ubuzima babayemo ibyo ngo ntabwo byaramba mu matwi yabo kuko abenshi baba badasobanukiwe n’ibyo ubabwira.
Ati “Ushobora gukora urwenya kamere kavukire ya Kinyarwanda utagombeye kwigana ibyakozwe n’Umunya-Uganda cyangwa Umunya-Nigeria.”
Yasabye abanyarwenya kutirushya bata umwanya bahanga urwenya ruvuga ibitandukanye n’ubuzima umubare munini wabo basetsa batisangamo.
Ati “Dukomoka mu muco n’ururimi nyarwanda rufite urwenya, ndabwira Abanyarwanda dusangiye ibyo, ninjya kuvuga amakaroni yenda 60% ntibazi icyo ari cyo, ndirushya ntera urwenya rwo mu ndege hari abantu batarurira indege yenda, badateze no kuzayurira ndarwana n’iki? 
Navuze ibintu dusangiye? Iyo ubivuze mu rwenya baraseka udaseka muba mufitanye ikibazo.”
Gasumini avuga ko ajya i Burayi akabakinira mu byabo yagaruka mu Rwanda naho agakina ibyabo, ibyo akabikora atari uko ananiwe gukora urwenya ruvuga iby’ahandi cyangwa rukoresha indimi z’ahandi, ahubwo aterwa ishema no kubasangiza ibyo basangiye.
Yavuze ko ntacyo agaya abana bari mu rwenya uyu munsi, ko bakora neza kandi impano zihari ko ahubwo igisigaye ari ukwiga gusoma ku bantu kugira ngo bamenye ko aho bari n’ibyo babamo byabera isomo abandi.
Atome yishimira cyane urwenya rwo mu Rwanda aho rumaze kugera, ibitaramo bitegurwa buri kwezi bihuza Abanyarwenya batandukanye baba abaturutse hanze n’abo imbere mu gihugu.
Uyu munyarwenya wamamaye yakoze urwitwa ‘gasumuni gasuzuguro’ yemeza ko atigeze azima ko ahubwo kutagaragara mu itangazamakuru bitavuze ko adakora dore ko hashize iminsi mike avuye gukina mu Bufaransa.
Atome ni Umunyarwanda wavukiye i Burundi, yize ibijyanye n’ikinamico no gukina filime mu Bubiligi mu ishuri ryitwa Conservatoire Royal de Liège, mbere yaho yari yarize ibijyanye n’amategeko muri Kaminuza nkuru y’u Rwanda i Butare, yabaye n’umusirikare mu gihe cyo kubohora u Rwanda mu ngabo za RPA.

Title: Miss Rda2020: Naomie wavugishije benshi agikandagira mu irushanwa yegukanye Ikamba
Body:
Nishimwe Naomie wavugishije benshi ku munsi wa mbere ubwo yinjiraga mu irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020, yegukanye ikamba ry’umukobwa uhiga abandi mu bwiza bw’inyuma ku mubiri, ubumenyi n’umuco ahigika abandi 18 bari bahanganye.
Ifoto y’uyu munyarwandakazi yacicikanye ku mbuga nkoranyambaga za benshi ubwo yazaga guhatanira guhagararira Umujyi wa Kigali, benshi bamuhaye ikamba ataranatangira urugendo rw’iri rushanwa.
Bavugaga ko ubwiza bw’uyu mukobwa butabona ubuhiga, agira n’amahirwe atambuka muri icyo kiciro cy’amajonjora y’abagombaga guhagararira Intara enye n’umujyi wa Kigali ndetse aza no gukomeza no mu kindi kuko yari yatowe cyane.
Umwiza Phionah we yabaye igisonga cya mbere mu gihe Umutesi Denise yabaye igisonga cya Kabiri.
Mu birori biri kubera mu cyumba kigari cya Intare Arena i Rusororo mu karere ka Gasabo, hateraniye abantu mu ngeri zinyuranye barimo ba Miss Uganda, Burundi na Miss Tanzania.
Abakobwa 19 bari bamaze iminsi bari mu mwiherero mu karere ka Bugesera, batozwa inyigisho zinyuranye zirimo Indangagaciro, umuco ndetse n’amateka y’u Rwanda.
Ubu bari muri Kigali Arena kugira ngo batoranywemo umukobwa wambikwa ikamba ryo guhagararira abakobwa b’u Rwanda muri uyu mwaka wa 2020.
Muri iki cyumba giteraniyemo abantu batandukanye barimo abaje gushyigikira aba bakobwa, hari n’abafite ikamba rya ba nyampinga mu bihugu byabo nk’uwo muri Uganda, uwo mu Burundi, uwo muri Tanzania, uwa Ghana, ndetse n’uwo muri Botswana.
Abagize akanama Nkemurampaka karimo n’icyamamare mu kubyina Sherrie Silver, umunyamakuru Evelyne Umurerwa, Umunyarwenya Ntarindwa Diogene ndetse na Munyaneza Jamas.
Abakobwa babanje gukimbagira imbere y’abagize akanama nkemurampaka n’abitabiriye iki gikorwa mu makanzu atagira uko asa ndetse no mu ntambuko zibereye ijisho zimenyerewe mu myiyerekano y’abamurika ubwiza, ikimero ndetse n’imideri.
21:10- Ubu abakobwa bari kunyura imbere y’aba bakemurampaka babazwa ibibazo binyuranye byiganjemo ibigaruka ku muco w’u Rwanda ndetse no kwigira kw’Abanyarwanda.
Umukobwa unyuze imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka arakirwa n’urufaya rw’amajwi y’abaje kumushyigikira bari muri iki cyumba kigari.
21:40- Nishimwe Naomie wakunze gucicikana ku mbuga nkoranyambaga kubera uburanga bwe, yageze imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka yakirizwa urufaya rw’amashyi.
Uyu mukobwa wabajijwe kuri Rwanda Day, yavuze ko ari igitekerezo cyazanywe n’abanyarwanda baba mu mahanga bifuje ko bazajya bahura na Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda kugira ngo bungurane ibitekerezo ku buryo bakomeza guteza imbere igihugu cyabo.
21:53- Umutesi Denise na we wakiranywe ubwuzu bwinshi n’abafana, abajijwe ku bijyanye n’Umwiherero uherutse guhuza abayobozi mu Nzego Nkuru, avuga ko waganiriwemo ingingo zinyuranye zirimo kurwanya ruswa, avuga ko ruswa iramutse icitse igihugu cyabona imisoro ihagije kikarushaho gutera imbere.
22:02- Abakobwa bose bamaze kunyura imbere y’akanama Nkemurampaka basubiza ibibazo babajijwe n’abagize akanama Nkemurampaka nka bimwe mu biza kugenderwaho hatoranywa umukobwa uhiga abandi mu bwiza n’ubumenyi.
Abagize akanama Nkemurampaka bagiye kwiherera, bagaruke batangaza abakobwa 10 bakomeza mu kiciro gikurikiraho bongere kubazwa ibibazo.
22:50- Abagize akanama Nkemurampaka bagarutse mu byicaro, hatangazwa abakobwa bakomeza mu kiciro gikurikira.

Title: Niyubahwe ukorera umuziki muri Finland yasohoye indirimbo y’amashusho anogeye ijisho
Body:
Umunyarwanda Benjamin Niyubahwe usanzwe atunganyiriza umuziki muri Finland, yashyize hanze indirimbo yise Ingabire ifite amashusho anogeye ijisho kubera ubuhanga iyi video ikoranye.
Uyu musore w’imyaka 22, yatangiye umuziki akiri ingimbi kuko kuva ku myaka 13 y’amavuko yaririmbaga muri korari y’abana ubwo yari akiri mu Rwanda.
Akimara kwimukira muri Finland n’ubundi yakomeje gukora umuziki ariko yishimisha nyuma aza kujya kuwihuguramo ndetse no kuwutunganya, ubu ari kuwukora mu buryo bw’umwuga.
Benjamin ubu unafite inzu itunganya umuziki Ben Records muri kiriya gihugu, yashyize hanze indirimbo ye yanakorewe muri iyi studio.
Iyi ndirimbo yise Ingabire, yuzuye amagambo y’urukundo aririmbamo abwira umukobwa ko azamukunda bigashyira kera.
Muri iyi ndirimbo atangira agira ati “Mbwiza ukuri ko ntarimo kurota, nyizeza ko nijoro tuzaba turi kumwe icyizere cy’umunezero wanjye ni wowe iyo undeba unsekera bimvura amavunane komeza komeza komeza unkunde nanjye sinzarekera…”
Uyu musore ukomeza aririmba ko umukobwa bakundana ari yo mvura y’imigisha, hari aho avugamo ko uwo mutarutwa we ari we ukwiye urufunguzo rw’umutima we ndetse ko na we yamaze kumwiyegurira.
Benjamin avuga ko yahisemo kuririmba mu njyana ya R&B kuko ari yo asanwe yiyumvamo kandi akaba anayikunda.
Uretse amagambo y’urukundo asize umunyu yumvikana muri iyi ndirimbo yasohokanye na video, irimo amashusho anogeye ijisho kubera ubwiza n’ikimero cy’umukobwa uteye ukwe ugaragara muri aya mashusho.
Ni amashusho kandi yafatiwe ahantu nyaburanga nko mu busitani butoshye, hakaba hari n’ikirere gisa neza.
Iyi video kandi igaragaramo ubuhanga kuko harimo amashusho yafatiwe mu kirere n’utudege tutagira abapilote tuzwi nka drones.

Title: Marigarita {Mukandimbati/Papa Sava} yavuze Minisiteri yifuza kuyobora
Body:
Clementine Uwimana uri kumenyekana nka Marigatita muri Film y’uruhererekane izwi nka Papa Sava akinamo ari umugore w’uwitwa Ndimbati, yavuze ko aramutse agiriwe ikizere akagirwa Minisitiri yakwishimira kuba uw’Iterambere ry’Umuryango.
Mu kiganiro kirambuye yagiranye n’Umuseke, Uwimana cyangwa Marigarita avuga ko ubusanzwe akunda ibijyanye na Politiki kuko «Umuntu aramutse yanze kuyikina we imukinamo. »
Uyu mugore wize ibijyanye n’amategeko akanabikora muri rumwe mu nzego za Leta zo mu Rwanda, avuga ko ibitekerezo bye bikunze kugaruka ku muryango.
Ati «Mbabazwa cyane no kubona umwana afite ikibazo ahanini kivuye ku babyeyi be akagirwaho ingaruka n’ikintu atigeze amenya. »
Uyu mubyeyi w’abana babiri avuga ko Leta iramutse imugiriye ikizere ikamuha umwanya ukomeye, yakwifuza kwibona muri Minisiteri ifite inshingano zihuye no guteza imbere Umuryango nka Minisiteri y’Uburinganire n’Iterambere ry’Umuryango.
Ati «Mbonye bampamagaye mu mwanya utuma nzabonamo abana, nkabona uko nagira imiryango inama tugafatanya nakwishima cyane.»
Avuga ko muri iriya Minisiteri yifuza kuyobora, hari byinshi byakozwemo mu kuzamura imibereho y’imiryango ariko ko hakiri byinshi byo gukora ku buryo aramutse agezemo yakomerezaho bityo n’ibibazo bigihari bigakemuka.
Marigarita ufite impamyabumenyi y’ikiciro cya Kabiri cya Kaminuza mu bijyanye n’amategeko, avuga ko uburezi bwo mu Rwanda na bwo bukwiye kongerwamo ingufu kuko ari bwo musingi w’inzego zose.
Anenga abarimu bo muri iki gihe kuko baza muri uyu mwuga batawukunze mu gihe abawukoraga mu bihe byatabutse bawuzagamo bumva ko ari umuhamagaro.
Avuga ko ibi bituma uru rwego rurushaho kuzamba kuko uburezi bushingiye ku barimu.
Marigarita yakinnye muri film zitandukanye zirimo nka City Maid, Seburikoko na Papa Sava yanatumye yamamara aho akina ari umugore wa Ndimbati.

Title: Yverry yashimiye Bruce Melodie utaje mu kumurika Album ye
Body:
Rugamba Yves uzwi nka Yverry yaraye amuritse Album ye ya mbere ashimira Bruce Melodie utaje muri iki gitaramo kandi yari yarabimwemereye. Mu riki gitaramo cyo kumurika album yise I love you more, Yverry yafashijwe n’abahanzi batandukanye bo mu Rwanda harimo n’abo biganye. Uretse Bruce Malodie utaje, na King Jamas nubwo yitabiriye igitaramo ariko ntiyaririmbye kubera uburwayi bwo gusarara.
Yverry yashimiye Bruce Melodie nubwo ataje kuko atigeze amuca intege ngo amumenyeshe ko atazaza. Ati “Iyo aza kumbwira kare ko atazaboneka nari gucika intege nkumva ko bigoye ariko yaricecekeye nkomeza kwizera ko ahari mbimenya ku munota wa nyuma ko atari buze igitaramo cyatangiye, ndabimushimira pe ni umunyabwenge.”
Ibyaranze iki gitaramo
Ni igitaramo kitabiriwe n’abantu benshi ku buryo nyiri kumurika Album yabuze uko abisobanura usibye kuvuga ko yishimye gusa.
Iki gitaramo kandi kitabiriwe na bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru nk’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Ministeri y’Urubyiruko n’Umuco, Bamporiki Edouard.
Symphony Band ni yo yacurangaga ndetse ikananyuzamo ikanaririmba mu gihe Pendo Anitha na Kate Gustave bari abasangiza b’amagambo banasurutsa abaje.
Yvan Impano yageze ku rubyiniro arimba indirombo ebyiri zakunzwe akurikirwa na Cyusa waje mu njyana gakondo byagaragaye ko ikunzwe n’abenshi.
Social Mura na we ugezweho muri iki gihe, yaririmbye indirimbo eshatu zahagurukije abakunzi ba muzika.
Saa 22h40 Yverry yazamutse ku rubyiniro, azanye udushya twinshi two kuba yafashijwe n’abasore bacurangishaga umunwa, aririmba indirimbo umunani.
Udushya twabaye muriki gitaramo
Yvrerry yahawe ibahasha na Ministiri Bamporiki yateye amatsiko benshi bifuza kumenya impano amuhaye.
Abantu benshi batangajwe no kubona Yverry yita Mama we ko ari we Valentine we mu gihe umukunzi we yari yitabiriye icyo gitaramo atigeze  igira icyo amuvugaho ku munsi w’abakundanye.
Yverry ni we muhanzi wa mbere ubimburiye abandi mu banyeshuri biganye mu ishuri rya muzika ryo ku Nyundo gushyira hanze Album.
Yverry yatangiye umuziki mu mwaka wa 2009, muri  2014  yerekeza mu ishuri rya muzika ryo ku Nyundo  yiga ibijyanye no gucuranga akaba ari mu bambere barirangirijimo.
Nicola YUSUF

Title: Ama G ntiyemera St Valentin ariko asaba abakundana kutaryaryana
Body:
Taliki ya 14 Gashyantare buri mwaka hizihizwa umunsi w’abakundanye ku’isi witwa Saint Valantin, mu Rwanda naho ibyishimo byawo birahagera, ibyamamare bitandukanye byavuganye n’Umuseke ku butumwa bujyanye n’uyu munsi.
Bamwe mu byamamare mu muziki nyarwanda bavuganye n’Umuseke bifuriza abakunzi uyu munsi, barimo Gatsinzi Emery uzwi nka Riderman.
Uyu muraperi umaze igihe mu muziki akaba afatwa nk’igikomerezwa mu njyana ya Hiphop ndetse yegukanye ibihembo byinshi muri iyi njyana, yageneye ubutumwa abakundanye yifashishije amagambo avugwa muri Bibiliya.
Ati ”Imana ni urukundo, udakunda ntazi Imana, ku munsi nk’uyu abantu bagomba kuzirikana imbaraga z’urukundo bakazirikana ko urukundo ari rwo ruyoboye Isi udakundana ntazi Imana, mukundane.”
Itahiwacu Bruce uzwi nka Bruce Melodie, na we ari mu bahanzi nyarwanda bigaruriye imitima ya benshi kubera ijwi rye ndetse n’indirimbo nyishi zikunzwe, na we yatwaye ibihembo bitandukanye ni na we Munyarwanda wa mbere wageze muri Coke Studio.
We avuga ko uyu munsi atawufata nk’uhuza abadahuje ibitsina, cyangwa abakundana nk’Umugore n’Umugabo, ahubwo ngo ni umunsi w’umubano mu bantu.
Ati ”Bakore ibikorwa byose by’urukundo bitarimo ‘kuryamana’.” 
Hakizimana Amani uzwi nka Amag The Black, uyu ni umuraperi akaba n’umukinyi wa filime ngufi.
Yaririmbye indirimbo nyishi zikundwa bitewe n’ubutumwa buzikubiyemo, we avuga ko atemera uyu munsi ariko ngo ntiyabura kugira icyo abwira abawemera.
Ati ”Abakundanye ni bakomeze bakundane, ntibaryaryane bagerageze bakore uko bashoboye ku buryo umunsi ubagendekera neza.”
Umunsi  wa Sait Valentin wavuye ku Mupadiri w’Umuroma witwa Valentin wabayeho mu myaka ya 269 na 273 mbere y’ivuka rya Yezu Kiristu.
Muri icyo gihe, tariki ya 14 Gashyantare habaga umunsi mukuru wo kwizihiza Umwamikazi Juno wafatwaga nk’Imana y’Abagore.
Nicola YUSUF

Title: Bwa mbere kompanyi yo mu Rwanda igiye gutanga ibihembo mpuzamahanga muri Film
Body:
Ishusho Art isanzwe itegura ibihembo bihabwa abakinnyi ba film mu Rwanda, igiye kwagura ibi bikorwa itange ibihembo byo ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Ibi bihembo byiswe Rwanda International Movie Award, bizahuza abo mu bihugu bitandukanye birimo Uganda,Tanzania, Kenya,u Burundi, DRC n’u Rwanda. Bikazatangwa tariki ya 07 Werurwe 2020.
Jackson Mucyo umuyobozi wa Ishusho Art itegura ibi bihembo, yabwiye umuseke ko bahereye muri ibi bihugu byo mu karere kugira ngo babanze bagire ubunararibonye ariko ko mu bihe biri imbere bazanabyagura bagashyiramo ibindi byo muri Africa.
Ati «Uburyo wakwakira abaturanyi si ko wakwakira abantu utazi namba, twagiraga ngo tubanze tumenye ibijyanye no kwakira abantu no kumenya quality ya event buri kantu kose ku buryo 2021 tuzaba twakira event nini.»
Avuga ko iki gikorwa kizafasha Film Nyarwanda gutera imbere kuko aya marushanwa azatuma cinema y’abanyarwanda imenyekana mu karere.
Ati «Turashaka kumenyekanisha film nyarwanda uwo muri Senegal amenye ko dufite film, turashaka kwereka ko umuntu adakora ibintu byiza ko ari cyo gihe cyo kubikora.»
Jackson avuga ko film nyarwanda zigifite imbogamizi z’ururimi kuko inyinshi zikinnye mu Kinyarwanda kandi cyumvwa na bacye mu karere, akavuga ko uko ubushobozi buzarushaho kuboneka abanyarwanda bazagenda banatunganya film zo mu zindi ndimi cyangwa iziri mu kinyarwanda bagashyiraho Subtitle.
Jackson uga biriya bihembo bizanitabirwa n’ibihugu nka Nigero n’Ubuhindi bizaza nk’abashyiti, nta mafaranga azatangwamo ahubwo ko ari ishimwe ariko rifite akamaro kurusha ubushobozi bw’amafaranga.
Ikiciro cya mbere cy’ibihugu cyashyizwe hanze, ku ruhande rw’u Rwanda harimo ibyiciro bibiri by’abagabo bitwaye neza mu gukina film ndetse n’icy’abagore.

Title: Nizzo avuga ko Safi ashatse kugaruka muri Urban Boyz amarembo afunguye
Body:
Nizzo Kabosi uririmba mu itsinda rya Urban Boyz, avuga ko Safi Madiba bahoranye muri iri tsinda aramutse ashatse kurigarukamo yaza yisanga ndetse ko hari benshi byashimisha.
Safi Madiba witandukanyije na bagenzi be muri 2018, aherutse no kuva muri Label ya The Mane yamufashaga.
Nizzo Kabosi bahoranye muri Urban Boyz, yabwiye Umuseke ko Safi nta kintu na kimwe cyamubuza  kugaruka muri ririya itsinda yakuriyemo kuko azi neza ko ntawe byababaza kandi ngo no kuri bo byaba ari byiza.
Ati “Icyo apfa ni ukuza agasaba abantu imbabazi ni iwabo hamureze ni kanaka Urban Boyz iteka bazabimubonamo ashatse gutaha iwabo ntawabuza umuntu gutaha iwabo.”
Safi akiva muri Urban Boyz havuzwe byinshi ko yahoraga ashondana na Nizzo Kabosi. Uyu musore ukiri muri ririya tsinda avuga ko bombi nta kibazo bagifitanye ariko ko nta bundi bucuti bagifitanye kuko nta na nimero ye ya telephone afite.
Ati “Mu muco nyarwanda n’uwakwiciye murasangira nkanswe biriya.”
Nizzo avuga ko Safi  aramutse agarutse muri Ubran Boyz yagira icyo abafasha kuko mu buzima ntamuntu utagira akamaro ko no gutanga  ibitekerezo byaba bihagije.
Safi Madiba yavuye muri Urban Boyz bari bamaranye imyaka 10 bakorana nk’itsinda bakaba baratwaye igihembo cya PGGSS.
Nizzo na humble Jizzo basigaranye muri ririya tsinda bakomeje kwerekana ko batari bagizwe na Safi nk’uko byavugwaga bashyira hanze indirimbo zakunzwe zirimo ‘Ntakibazo’ bafatanyije na Bruce Melody na Riderman, n’indi bise Kigali Love.
Urban Boyz ubu yanashinze inzu itunganya umuziki izwi nka Urban Record ari na yo itunganya indirimbo zabo.
Nicolas YUSUF

Title: Mudandi yasohoye indirimbo ivuga ku mukobwa ureshya igitsinagabo
Body:
Umuhanzi Ndamyirokoye François wiyita Mudandi Frank mu buhanzi yashyize hanze indirimbo yitwa ‘Kabana’ ivuga ku mukobwa wambara imyambaro ireshya abagabo bigatuma inshuti ye ihangayika.
Mudandi yabwiye Umuseke iyi ndirimbo ishingiye ku byo akunze kubona mu buzima busanzwe.
Iyi ndirimbo ivuga ko mukobwa uba afite umukunzi ariko akambara imyenda ireshya abandi bagabo.
Ati “We (umugabo/umusore) akabura amahoro  yibwira ko bamumutwara.”
Uyu muhanzi avuga ko iyi ndirimbo ye izaba iri kuri album ari gutegura azashyira hanze muri uyu mwaka.
Ni indirimbo ibyinitse, avuga ko yayikoze kugira ngo abakunda kunyeganyega barusheho kumererwa neza.
Yashyize hanze izindi ndirimbo zirimo iyitwa Ni Miss, Cherie yakoranye na Young Grace, iyitwa Umuntu mbwa yakoranye na Jay C n’iyitwa Kenyera ukomeze yakoranye na Intore Masamba, Makanyaga, Mariya Yohana na Nzayisenga Sophia.

Nicolas YUSUF

Title: Umunyamerika yasimbujwe umunya-Nigeria muri Seka Live y’ukwa 02
Body:
Umunyarwenya w’Umunyamerika Usama Siddique wagombaga kuza mu gitaramo ngarukakwezi kizwi nka Seka Live cy’uku kwa Gashyantare, yasimbujwe Umunya- Nigeria Kenny blaQ.
Iki gitaramo cy’urwenya kizaba ku wa 29 Gashyantare, mbere bacyamamaza bavugaga ko kizitabirwa n’uriya munyamerika Usama Siddique akagifatanyamo na n’Umunyafurika y’Epfo Ndumiso Lindi.
Arthur Nkusi utegura iki gitaramo yabibwiye Umuseke ko habayemo impinduka kuko uriya munyamerika atakije mu cy’uku kwezi ahubwo ko yasimbuwe n’uriya munya- Nigeria, Kenny blaQ.
Arthur umaze kumenyekana nka Rutura avuga ko uriya munya-Nigeria n’ubundi bari bamaze igihe bamwifuza nyuma bakaza kumenya amakuru ko azajya gutaramira abaturanyi b’Abangande bagahita bamufatira hafi.
Ati “Tumaze igihe tumushaka twari twaramubuze ubwo twamufatiranyije, kandi bigabanya n’amafaranga twari kumutangaho.”
Avuga ko uyu munyarwenya afite izina rikomeye mu mwuga wo gusetsa ugereranyije n’uriya munyamerika n’ubwo na we atoroshye.
Akomeza avuga ko  bari bakeneye izina risa n’irikurura abantu mu buryo bworoshye ribafasha no kwamamaza.
Ngo yakoresheje tombola ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, abakunzi ba Comedy benshi bagaragaza ko bashaka Kenny blaQ .
Ngo abakunzi ba Usama Siddique na bo ntibagire impungenge kuko na we azaza muri iki gitaramo ngarukakwezi kuko bamaze no kumwishyura.
Nicolas YUSUF

Title: Umunyamakuru A. Cyiza ngo gutara inkuru za Perezida byatumye akura mu mwuga
Body:
Umunyamakuru wa Royal FM na Isango Star, Aissa Cyiza avuga ko gutara no gutangaza inkuru z’umukuru w’igihugu biri mu byamuzamuriye ubumenyi mu mwuga w’Itangazamakuru.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye n’Umuseke, Aissa Cyiza umaze kwamamara mu Itangazamakuru, avuga ko ubwo yakoraga ku kinyamakuru yatangiriyeho Isango Star yajyaga gutara inkuru akanazitangaza.
Avuga ko kujya gutara inkuru [ibizwi nka Terrain] ari kimwe “mu bintu bivuna ku buryo iyo wayikoze yuzuye ndetse ukabona itambutse biragushimisha cyane.”
Avuga ko hari ibihe by’ingezi adashobora kwibagirwa mu mwuga wo gutara no gutangaza inkuru by’umwihariko mu bikorwa by’umukuru w’Igihugu.
Ati “Tukiri ku Isango star mur 2013-2014 ndi umwe mu bantu bajyaga cyane mu nkuru za Perezida Paul Kagame, nahuriyemo na byinshi ariko byamfashije gukura mu mwuga w’itangazamakuru.”
Yavuye ku Isango yerekeza kuri Royal FM, akajya akora ibiganiro byiganjemo imiziki, amagambo akaba macye.
Ati “Mu gihe ku Isango Star byari bitandukanye kuko ho twaravugaga cyane umwanya w’umuziki ukaba mucye.”
Avuga ko kandi muri uyu mwuga yawungukiyemo inshuti nyinshi zirimo n’abayobozi mu nzego za Leta n’iz’abikorera.
Aissa Cyiza usanzwe akora ibiganiro bitanga inama avuga ko Itangazamakuru ryo mu Rwanda ryagize uruhare mu kumvisha abanyarwanda ihame ry’uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye.
Avuga ko hari ibiganiro byagiye binyura mu bitangazamakuru yaba kuri  radio, televiziyo  ndetse n’ibyandikira kuri murandasi byahoraga byerekana ko umwana w’umukobwa ashoboye.
Muri iki kiganiro cyagarutse ku rugendo rwe muri uyu mwuga, yavuze ko yarutangiye muri 2012 akiri ku ntebe y’ishuri mu mashuri yisumbuye.
Ati “N’ubusanzwe mu mashuri yisumbuye nabaga muri ‘media club’ ariko nyuma yo gusoza amashuri nagiye kwimenyereza itangazamakuru, ntangira ndi umukoranabushake kuri radio ya Isango Star nyuma bampa akazi nkora ibiganiro bitandukanye gusa uko iminsi yashiraga bambonagamo ikizere ari na byo byamfashije kwinjira mu mubare w’abasomaga amakuru kuri iyo radio.”
Ubu ni umwe mu bagore bakora Itangazamakuru rikabatunga. Avuga ko icyamufashije gutera imbere mu mwuga w’itangazamakuru harimo n’abakozi beza yakoranye na bo igihe yari agitangira uyu mwuga.
Umubare muto w’abagore bakora itangazamakuru
Aissa Cyiza  ati “Urebye kuva na kera ababyeyi bacu ntibiyumvagamo umwuga w’itangazamakuru nk’uko biyumvagamo ibindi birimo nk’ubuganga, ubwubatsi n’ibindi. Byasaga nk’aho ari umwuga mushya kuri bo bityo rero byari bigoye ko twe nk’abakobwa twibwiriza kwiga itangazamakuru ahubwo twahitagamo kwiga ibyo ababyeyi bacu bifuzaga.”
Akomeza avuga ko n’umubare muto w’ibitangazamakuru n’ikibazo cy’amikoro muri uyu mwuga biri mu bituma abakobwa n’abagore batinya kwinjira muri aka kazi .
Bwa mbere akivugira kuri  ‘micro’ ya radio byari bimeze gute?
Ati “Urebye natangiye kujya kuri ‘micro’ ya radio nkiga muri st Joseph icyo gihe ku ishuli twari dufite ‘media Club’ akenshi navugiraga kuri ‘micro’ iri bwumvwe n’abanyeshuri 1 500, ngera ku isango Star nabanje kugira ubwoba ariko uko igihe cyashiraga narushagaho kumenyera.”
Agira inama umukobwa wifuza gukora itangazamakuru.
Ati «Itangazamakuru ni kimwe mu bintu bya mbere bifasha mu byishimo, ni umwuga uryoha cyane ndetse umukobwa wese wifuza kwiga itangazamakuru namubwira rwose ntacike intege kuko ririmo ibintu byinshi kandi iyo ubikoze kinyamwuga ukuramo amafaranga.»
Avuga ko ibitangazamakuru bikorera mu Rwanda bitanga amahirwe ku bakobwa n’abagore ndetse ngo bamwe mu babikorera biteje imbere mu buryo bugaragara  hari n’abandi babyaza umusaruro amahirwe babona bakaba bakorera nk’ibitangazamakuru birenze kimwe.
Robert KAYIHURA

Title: Audy Kelly ngo Perezida Kagame natiyamamaza na we ashobora kuzatanga Kandidatire
Body:
Umuhanzi Audaci Munyangango uzwi nka Audy Kelly avuga ko Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Rwanda, Paul Kagame yakoze byinshi byiza akwiye gushimirwa ku buryo bigoye kuzabona umusimbura ariko ko natiyamamaza muri manda zizakurikira na we (Audy Kelly) ashobora kuzatanga kandidatire.
Uyu muhanzi ashima ibikorwa bya Perezida Kagame wazahuye igihugu cy’u Rwanda cyahereye ku busa ubu kikaba kirahirirwa n’amahanga.
Avuga ko muri Manda zikurikira yifuza kuzabona Perezida Kagame yimamaza ariko ko aramutse atiyamamaje, na we ubwe ashobora kuzatanga kandidatire.
Ati “Nimbona abakandida bariho batabasha nziyamamaza, sinkunda kubona ibintu bipfa iyo mbonye ahari ibitagenda mpita mfata inshingano.”
Mu mvugo z’ab’ububu, uyu muhanzi akomeza asa nk’ushyenga ati “Nimbona abiyamamaza mbashidikanyaho nzatezamo.” 
Avuga ko ubuyobozi bw’u Rwanda muri rusange bwagize amahirwe kuko n’abandi basanzwe bafasha umukuru w’igihugu na bo bashishoza ku buryo ari byo bituma iki gihugu gikomeza gutera imbere.
Auddy Kelly avuga ko abanyafurika bagifite imyumvire ikiri hasi ku buryo baba bakeneye umuyobozi ushishoza cyane.
Uyu muhanzi uvuga ko ataratangira kwinjira mu bya politiki, avuga ko ayikurikiranira hafi ku buryo ibiba bivugirwamo byose akunze kubimenya.
Uyu muhanzi wamenyekanye mu bihe byatambutse akaza kutongera kuvugwa, aherutse gushyira hanzeyise ‘KUBI’.
Audy Kelly afite impamyabumenyi y’icyiciro cya gatatu cya kaminuza (master’s degree) mu bijyanye n’ubucuruzi.

Yusuf NICOLAS

Title: (Video) Abakobwa 20 babwiwe  kwiyizera aho gutekereza  undi uzabagira Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020
Body:
Abakobwa bitabiriye irushanwa rya Miss Rwanda 2020 mbere yo kwerekeza i Nyamata mu mwiherero habanje kugirana ikiganiro n’Abanyamakuru, mbere yahoo bagiriwe inama ziha buri wese amahirwe yo kwegukana ikamba rya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda 2020.
Ikiganiro cyabereye muri Intare Arena,  abakobwa bari baherekejwe n’ababyeyi , abavandimwe ndetse n’inshuti.
Ishimwe Dieudonne Umuyobozi wa Inspiration Back Up itegura irushanwa, yababwiye ko bagomba kugira ikinyabupfura no kuba abo bari bo ntibashake kwigira ukundi batari.
Yababwiye ko ikizabafasha kwitwara neza ari ugushyira imbere imishinga yabo no kwirinda ibivugwa ku mbugankoranyambaga kuko bishobora kubatesha umurongo bikabaviramo gutsindwa.
Ishimwe kandi yabibukije kwirinda ababaha inama z’uburyo bitwara mu irushanwa kuko benshi usanga batarigeze baryitabira.
Ati: “Wikumva abakubwira ngo gira gutya na gutya, abandi bakubwira ngo tuzagufasha.”
Miss Rwanda, uyitegura yabwiye abayitabiriye ko nta muntu ushobora kubizeza ngo azabafasha ngo batsinde kubera imbaraga runaka cyangwa aho ahurira n’abategura irushanwa, ngo gutsinda bisaba urimo kuzuza ibigenderwaho.
Miss Rwanda2019 ucyuye igihe Nimwiza Meghan yagiriye inama abakobwa bahatanira kumusimbura kubaka ubucuti hagati yabo mu gihe bazaba bari mu mwiherero ndetse no gusenga.
Ati ”Kubaka ubushiti hagati yanyu bibafasha gufashanya icyo uzi ukagikorera utakizi.”
Yababwiye ko nta we ugomba gukangwa n’umukobwa uvugwa cyane ko ari we uzatsinda kuko na we atigeza arota ko yakwegukana ikamba.
Avuga ko we yashatse no kubeshya ko arwaye kugira ngo abone impamvu zo kutajya  mu kiciro cya nyuma (finale) kuko atari yiteze gutsinda.
Biteganyijwe ko finale ya Nyampinga w’u Rwanda izaba taliki 22 Gashyantare 2020 ikazabera muri  Intare Arena.
Gutora bizakorwa hakoreshejwe ubutumwa bugufi (SMS) ndetse na online.
Umwiherero igiye kwitabirirwa n’abakobwa 20 babashije kwitwara neza mu marushanwa yabanje baturuka mu Ntara zitandukanye z’igihugu n’Umujyi wa Kigali.

Title: Juda Music ntifite gahunda yo kuzarambira abakunzi bayo
Body:
Juda Music ni itsinda rigizwe n’abasore babiri, Ishimwe Prince witwa Da Rest na  Mbaraga Alex wiyise Junior, bavuga ko batazarambira abafana, ngo bazajya babaha ibitandukanye n’ibyo abandi bahanzi babaha.
Iri tsinda riririmba umwe mu buryo bwo kurapa (RAP), mugenzi we akaririmba mu buryo busanzwe.
Mu buryo bwo kudatanga ibintu bisa mu ndirimbo zabo, bahisemo ko umwe waririmbaga arapa mu ndirimbo zabanje, aririmba bisanzwe, umwe waririmbaga bisanzwe akaba ari we urapa mu ndirimbo basohoye nshya.
Uko guhinduranya kuririmba ngo bigaragaza ko byose babishoboye, kandi ko bizabafasha kutarambira abafana.
Ibyo babikoze mu ndirimbo yitwa ‘Amashyushyu’ bakoze, ikaba ituje.
Batangaza ko badashaka gukora nk’ibyo abandi bakora, ngo bashaka gukurura abakunzi mu mikorere itandukanye n’iy’abandi.
Junior ati “Ni byiza haribyo abatubanjirije bagezeho natwe turihano ngo twongereho ibyacu.”
Indirimbo ‘Amashyushyu’ ni inkuru ishingiye ku rukundo, umusore cyangwa umukobwa aba yibaza igihe na we azabonera uwo akunda na we akamukunda bya nyabyo.
Bayisohoye ari mu buryo bw’amajwi, amashusho na yo ngo arigukorwa.
Juda Music bamaze imyaka igera kuri ibiri mu muziki, bamakoze indirimbo 8 harimo n’izifite amashusho, zirimo   ‘Burundu’, ‘Rugende’, ‘Biramvuna’ n’izindi.

Title: Yverry na Muyoboke bavuga ko bitakiri ngombwa cyane gukorana n’abahanzi bo hanze
Body:
Ibi byagarutswe ho na Alex Muyoboke usanzwe afasha abahanzi  hamwe na Rugamba Yverry umuririmbyi w’injyana ya R&B. Bombi bemeza ko iyo witegereje intambwe umuziki w’abanyarwanda wagezeho usanga bitakiri ngombwa ko umuhanzi nyarwanda yifashisha umunyamahanga kugira ngo abafana be baze.
Ibi basanga byerekana iterambera rya muzika ndetse n’urukundo abaturage basigaye bakunda umuziki w’abahanzi bo mu Rwanda.
Muyoboke avuga ko kimwe mu byerekana ko ibyo avuga ari ukuri, ari uko buri mpera z’Icyumweru hari abantu benshi( we avuga ko bagera mu bihumbi) bajya mu tubyiniro kandi bakumva indirimbo z’abahanzi bo mu Rwanda.
Abajijwe niba mpungenge afite z’uko  hari bindi bitaramo bishobora guhurirana n’ibya abanyarwanda kandi byo birimo abahanzi mpuzamahanga bikabatwara abakiriya, avuga ko Kigali ituwe n’abagera kuri miliyoni kandi ngo ababarirwa mu bihumbi runaka bitabira ibitaramo by’abahanzi b’Abanyarwanda.
Avuga kandi ko niyo haba hari bamwe bagiye mu bitaramo by’abanyamahanga bitabuza ko hari abandi baboneka mu bitaramo by’Abanyarawanda.
Ati” Upfa kuba wamamaje igitaramo cyawe neza ubundi abantu baraza bamwe bakaza iwawe abandi bakajya ahandi.”
Rugamba Yverry ugiye kumurika album yitwa ‘Love you more’ yabwiye Umuseke ko nta mpungenge atewe n’igitaramo cyatumiwe mo abahanzi mpuzamahanga bizabera umunsi umwe kuko ngo Made In Rwanda yageze no mu muziki kandi bene yo bayikunda.
Ati: “Abahanzi bacu barakomeye bafite benshi babakunda kandi  baza no  kubareba.”
Ubwo azaba ari amurikira iriya album muri  Camp Kigali azashyigikirwa n’abahanzi nka King James ,Social Mula, Andy Bumuntu, Cyusa, Bruce Melody ,Queen Cha na Symphony Band.
Yusuf NICOLAS
